page.title: 08FAIRMEADOWS PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Opened in{September 1984}this school has 6 teachers, 2 assistants & several mums who work with the{152 pupils}aged 3-11. No uniform is worn except black for P.E. & red & yellow for games. Group & individual teaching methods are used & progress is recorded daily in reading & number. Group work takes place in different activity areas in the school. A rumpus room is for noisy and messy workers.Children use musical instruments & a variety of aids but little T.V. The{nursery pupils}do much artwork. They have a play kitchen, water bath, painting boards,plasticine and shape making sessions. There are 26 children in the nursery in the morning and a different group in the afternoon. Children are punished by being given a good talking to. The atmosphere of the school is very friendly and helpful.
